column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I can't believe it took me so long to finally go here. I loved everything from the ambiance to the food. It's a very speakeasy type of environment especially the downstairs. Super cozy and intimate. The old fashioned was incredible. The bone in filet was like butter
column2: cooked to medium rare at perfection and I think just won best steak in Chicago on my list. To end your meal
